subject: Football
United States Defense and Military Forces
Advertising and Marketing
lead_paragraph: In a letter to Sen. John McCain and Sen. Jeff Flake, Commissioner Roger Goodell said that the N.F.L. was conducting an audit of all contracts between the league’s 32 teams and various branches of the military.
snippet: In a letter to Sen. John McCain and Sen. Jeff Flake, Commissioner Roger Goodell said that the N.F.L. was conducting an audit of all contracts between the league’s 32 teams and various branches of the military.
